hero.title: About Inaa'sh
hero.description: It is an interactive awareness and training program to educate and raise awareness about emergency health and sports injuries and the proper ways to deal with them

target.title: Target audience
target.description: The program is aimed at all members of the community from the age of 8

main.title: The main goal
main.description: Providing awareness and education about health and sports emergencies to provide the necessary assistance to people before they reach health centers or other medical facilities and avoid life-threatening incidents using technology
main.sub-description: The principle is to build a healthier life, free from cardiovascular disease, stroke, and major sports injuries and to educate the individual on how to save lives, have a life free from serious diseases and live healthy while promoting the community to attend first aid, CPR and sports first responder courses.

objectives.title: Goals
objectives.description: Strengthening the capacity of community members on how to deal with emergencies, learn and provide assistance

about-us.title: Who We Are
about-us.description: The program is designed to provide emergency response training through fun and interactive scenario-based videos. The platform covers both health and sports injuries, aiming to educate users on basic skills to deal with emergencies. Key features include real-time questions on how to deal with the situation with the ability to track progress, evaluate performance, and obtain a certificate upon completion of the training program, our platform ensures a seamless user experience with options to update personal data, check certificates and share achievements on social media. The platform targets a wide audience, ranging from 8 to 60 years old, and promotes learning in a fun and interactive way with a focus on life-saving skills

updates.title: Challenges
updates.description: Many individuals lack the proper training to deal with health and sports emergencies. Traditional methods are often inaccessible and habitual. There is a need for an interactive platform that provides accessible and comprehensive training for emergencies.

solutions.title: Solutions
solutions.description: The platform provides a fun technology solution for emergency response training through interactive scenario-based videos, users learn health and sports-related emergency skills at their own pace. Featuring real-time quizzes, progress tracking, and performance assessments to keep users engaged, upon completion of the program users can earn certificates, easily verify their achievements and share their results on social media, this solution designed for a wide audience provides a modern and flexible way to equip individuals with essential life-saving skills and address the limitations of traditional training methods

first.title: Watch the program videos
first.description: Start your journey by watching videos of the interactive training program designed to engage and teach practical skills

second.title: Answer the questions
second.description: Test your understanding by answering the questions between each video

third.title: Progress
third.description: With each completed lesson, you can track your progress and deepen your knowledge

fourth.title: Get your certificate
fourth.description: Successfully complete all modules and assessments to receive a certificate of completion of the training program

fifth.title: Share your achievement
fifth.description: Celebrate your success! Share your certificate and program achievements on social media

why-us.title: Why Inaa'sh
why-us.description: Committed to providing fun training that equips you with basic emergency response skills

our-partners.title: Our partners
our-partners.description: We are proud to partner with leading organizations to deliver high-quality emergency response training, ensuring effective and up-to-date practices for health and sports-related situations.

rating.title: Help us optimize your experience
rating.description: Your feedback is important to us! Answer these quick questions to help us optimize the testing experience and platform

rating-list.1: How would you rate the overall usability of the test interface?
rating-list.2: Do the questions reflect real-life scenarios well enough to improve your understanding?
rating-list.3: How satisfied are you with the responsiveness and clarity of the video content?
rating-list.4: Was progress tracking (hearts, correct answers, time) useful during the test?

rating.textarea-placeholder: Tell us more about your experience!

complete-profile.title: Complete your profile
complete-profile.description: To proceed with your certification, please complete your profile
complete-profile.name: Name
complete-profile.success: Your personal details have been successfully completed

step1.title: Track Your Progress
step1.content: Monitor your progress while watching the video.

step2.title: Total Questions and Answers
step2.content: See how many questions are left and how many you answered correctly.

step3.title: Keep It Up!
step3.content: Start with 5 hearts! Lose one for a wrong answer, and gain one for a correct answer.

step4.title: Time Matters!
step4.content: Track how fast you choose the correct answer for each question.

step5.title: Scenario-Based Questions
step5.content: Answer questions in the video to test and improve your skills for real-life situations.

step6.title: Earn Your Certificate
step6.content: Complete the training program to get your certificate and showcase your skills!

step7.title: Share Results
step7.content: Option to share your achievement with others.
